0.1.name: wordpress/pure-css-emoticons
0.1.description:
Replace emoticons with a pure-CSS method. Instead of using the traditional image embeds, you know have more control over the look and feel of your site's emoticons with this pure CSS method.



Inspired by a good friend and developer, Steve Schwartz of Alpha Jango. See: http://www.alfajango.com/blog/jquery-css-emoticons-plugin/
